, mountNode, );`; const markdown2 = ` ~~~jsx ${code2} ~~~ `; const text = prompt text; const buttonWidth = 70; export const TooltipsComponentPage = () => { const [alert, setAlert] = useState(false); const [alert2, setAlert2] = useState(false); return (

Tooltip

A simple text popup tip.

When To Use

  • The tip is shown on mouse enter, and is hidden on mouse leave. The Tooltip doesn’t support complex text or operations.
  • To provide an explanation of a ‘button/text/operation’. It’s often used instead of the html ‘title’ attribute.

Examples

Basic

The simplest usage.

{alert ? ( } closable className="alert-copy-code" /> ) : ( "" )} ) : ( {children} ); }, }} />
Placement

There are 12 placement options available.
